General.Name: Liaoning Shidai Wanheng Co Ltd
General.Description: Liaoning Shidai Wanheng Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, production, and sale of energy batteries. It offers lithium-ion batteries used in electric tools; and nickel-metal hydride batteries used in personal care, consumer goods, electric tools, and other fields. The company is also involved in property leasing business; investment and operation of high-tech industrial projects, such as new energy batteries and new energy battery materials; office rental and storage business projects; and investment and investment project management. The company was formerly known as Liaoning Clothing Import and Export Company. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.
